mapper.sql: biw.inspection_way_id, biw.inspection_way_code, biw.inspection_way_desc, biw.inspection_type_id, biw.`status`, biw.remark, biw.org_id, biw.create_user_id, biw.create_time, biw.modified_user_id, biw.modified_time, biw.is_delete
mapper.select:
select , it.inspection_type_name, u.user_name as create_user_name, s.user_name as modified_user_name, bo.organization_name from fantech_imes_v2.base_inspection_way biw left join fantech_imes_v2.base_inspection_type it on biw.inspection_type_id=it.inspection_type_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on biw.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_v2.sys_user s on biw.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes_v2.base_organization bo on biw.org_id = bo.organization_id
and biw.inspection_way_code like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionWayCode}, '%')
and biw.inspection_way_desc like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionWayDesc}, '%')
and it.inspection_type_name like CONCAT('%', #{inspectionTypeName}, '%')
and biw.status=#{status}
and date_format(biw.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
order by biw.create_time desc
